outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to provide an integrated approach to support national and local governments in the design and implementation of national development strategies. The overall goal of the project is to enhance results oriented planning and coordination of the government at national and sub-national levels.
This will be achieved through supporting the development and implementation of a comprehensive and coherent national/sub-national strategy(s) for attaining development goals. Planning exercises will be conducted through broad consultations with wide segments of society, on both national and sub-national levels. The assistance provided through this project is meant to offer adequate and relevant support and policy services to facilitate this process during and after project implementation.
Institutional capacity and skills development will be the main support provided, as well as support to facilitate the process. In addition, awareness campaign and facilitation of public participation in the process will ensure transparency and the effectiveness of the sub-national strategy.

donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC

project_descr: Provision of On-Demand Consultancy Services in the Area of Public Sector Reform
project_title: On-Demand Consultancy Services in Area of Public Sector
